√sphuṭ 'burst'

present: [6.] sphuṭati etc. B.+   -- [1.] sphóṭati  

perfect: pusphoṭa  

[aorist: apusphuṭat  asphoṭīt  ]

future: [1.] sphuṭiṣyati etc.   -- [2.] sphuṭitā  

verbal: sphuṭita E.+  sphuṭitvā  

secondary: causative: sphoṭayati etc. E.+  

derivatives: sphuṭa E.+  sphoṭa E.+  sphuṭana C.  sphoṭana E.+
